thread.title: Yum Brands to Split into 2 Publicly Traded Companies
thread.title_full: Yum Brands to Split into 2 Publicly Traded Companies

title: Yum Brands to Split into 2 Publicly Traded Companies
text:
Published By: Fox Business - Today 
Yum Brands said it intended to separate its China and U.S. businesses into two independent, publicly traded companies. ...
